name: Hyper Drone
description:
Hyper Drone

Hyper Drone was made for the Triple Trijam in 2020.  An expansion of the classic asteroids game, Hyper Drone throws different types of asteroids, ship upgrades, and chain reaction asteroid explosions into the mix.

Controls

Move: arrow keys or WASD

Shoot: space

Software Used:
  • Unity
  • Inkscape
  • GIMP
Time Taken
  • Build 1 - 3:10:00
  • Build 2 - 3:07:00
  • Build 3 - 2:54:00
Useful Links:
  • How Games Use Feedback Loops
  • Object Pooling
  • Flow Theory in Game Design
  • Music Source
Themes Chain Reaction
  • Asteroids can bump into one another and break resulting in chaotic action.
  • The player can collect resources to upgrade their ship creating a positive feedback loop where by each successful run they become more powerful.
Negative Feedback Loop
  • As the player is more successful in reaching to goal more and stronger asteroids begin to spawn and increase the difficulty.
  • Failing closer to the goal is a more drastic setback then failing far from it. 
  • The cost of upgrades rises exponentially. This way, The more powerful your ship has become the more difficulty it becomes to gain more power.
Novel Twist on a Classic Game
  • Asteroids are able to hit each other.
  • There are a few different types of asteroids
  • Upgrades
  • A goal to reach
